title: No more update?
comment: Only one main problem...when synching new appointment...it do not show the new item until reboot.  Also widget text not scrolling on Lollipop.

title: Still great!
comment: This app still works great even though is hasn't been updated since 2012. Simple and efficient. GS5

title: Brilliant
comment: I have used Smooth calendar widget for years but this widget is default configured exactly as I want. Great work.

title: Great calendar widget!
comment: Tried a bunch. This is my fav.
Very nice app

title: Love this widget
comment: I must say that this is my go to calendar widget. Love the compact and versatile nature of the widget. I wish all calendar widgets were this clean, non-intrusive, and compact.  And it's free! Great job!

title: Compact design
comment: Compact and simple design. Looks great even in small screen device.
Montys

title: Very good, but
comment: It can be absolutely great if there's a link for each event on each line and a separate small button on one corner for a small menu with definitions, add event, etc... Very nice start, keep up the good work.
Love it!

title: The best
comment: My favorite calendar widget. My phone is never set up correctly until this is installed.

I love this Widget. Gives me a  view of events and appointments for the week in a double app space on my Homepage. You can adjust it to a clear background so that you see the live wallpaper behind it - nice!  Opens to a monthly calendar. Couldn't be better. Thanks!

title: Must have App.
comment: This calendar works Great. Thank you!!!  Nice design I like compared an notification 's about my calendar.  That would be perfect. :-)

title: Small, but perfectly formed
comment: Open source, does a lot, useful on older devices, with well thought out options.

title: 5 stars, Thanks Anton

title: Simple&effective
comment: Simple with reasonble permissions. Option 2  override callendars colors (and event text) would be great - allows good visibility for event family...

title: Shows multiple days
comment: Seems like most apps only show 1 day, or takes an entire screen, this shows multiple days on size of your choosing, very nice

title: Pointless

comment: Very helpful widget, but should have option to auto delete after a few days for old events

title: The best

Hoping you will update soon!

title: Super calendar

title: Anton's Calendar Widget
comment: Great app except for the fact when I add something to my calendar, it will not update on the widget screen until I click on the app and press settings...then it loads. Other than that I love it.

title: Forced shutdowns for Galaxy S2
comment: It was an awesome app - its the only calander widget that had a 2x1 calendar. Unfortunately, it caused my phone to shut down randomly. Maybe they'll fix the bug in the future.

title: Good with several widget sized
comment: Good,  easy, simple. Supports widgets in different sizes. Only flaw is that it takes longer before it updates after adding new item to calendar. Should have a manual refresh option.

title: Good display and options
comment: The selection of options is good but for 5 stars I would appreciate the ability to change the font color and also to have today's date displayed in the widget.

title: Nice
comment: Would be nice to have the today's stuff highlighted. Make it a lil easier to see at a glance.

title: Would be nice
comment: I would like to use it but it doesn't work with aCalendar. Refreshs don't work after a day, and if you accidentally click on the 'Open Calendar' area which you can't get rid of the app crashes. Shame because this is one of the very few notification apps out there without phony internet permissions.

title: Great App!
comment: Fantastic app but would like to be able to override calendar colours as Android is broken in this respect. I have two calendars that show black colour which is annoying and makes the widget look ugly.
Not good at all

title: Just what I needed

title: Exact
comment: This is exactly what I've been looking for a long time; I've tried almost any another app with widget and they massively lack the look and beautiful simplicity of this widget. Would be better with a scroll option but you'll also need a launcher, right?
Very good widget, thanks Anton! Font size option change is steep from 100 to 125%, how about 110%? Or bring in sliders for font size and opacity.

title: Awesome App
comment: Best widget out there. Its a shame its so far down the list. I've tried a lot of them searching for this one. Highly recommend.
LOVE This widget! Wish it was higher in the list so it was easier to find. Had to try soo many others before finding this one. The BEST!!! Thanks!
So simple to configure and looks sooo good! Great job!

Nice and simple

This is a simply elegant agenda-style calendar widget. It is clean and it blends right into the home screen with an assortment of widget sizes. Evo.

title: Needs option for other date formats
comment: Good widget - nice and clean. However need an option to have date formats other than month/day. Here in Australia as in other parts of the world we use day/month.

title: Best calendar widget I have found
comment: I'd love an option to be able to display the weekday name as well as the date for all events, not just the next 7 days. (e.g. W 12/5 2pm - 3pm) Also not sure how easy it is to implement, but being able to scroll to future events within the widget itself instead of having to go to the calendar app would be great.
Would be great to be able to choose which calendar app to run on click, not just default one.
Does not work on A70, see only grey box
Functional, and reasonable Google integration, however a lack of configurability lets this down [Galaxy Tab]
Great, clean, easy to read widget which is what I needed.

comment: Sure, I might have added a few more things, but this really does everything I need. I fits what I was looking for and doesn't have any weird permissions. Thanks!

title: Wonderful
